disableParam_NT.Wiki: Parameters marked with are excluded in the NT version package.

behaviorVariationId.Wiki: Variation ID used when calculating the action ID.

resistCorrectId_poison.Wiki: When the abnormal condition is activated, the maximum value is temporarily changed by using the set value of the abnormal condition resistance correction parameter.

turnVellocity.Wiki: Rotational speed [degrees / second] that can turn in 1 second.

hitHeight.Wiki: The height of the capsule per character.

hitYOffset.Wiki: Offset of the model display position in the Y (height) direction. It can be floated from the hit position.

getSoul.Wiki: The amount of soul that a character can get at the time of death.

itemLotId_enemy.Wiki: Specify the lottery ID_for enemies of the item to be acquired at the time of death. Please set only one of them.

itemLotId_map.Wiki: Specify for the lottery ID_map of the item to be acquired at the time of death. Please set only one of them.

maxAnkleRollAngle.Wiki: FootIK Ankle roll limit angle (-1 no limit)

chrHitGroupAndNavimesh.Wiki: Set the hit judgment with other characters (If you hit the ragdoll, other characters will hit the ragdoll)

faceIconId.Wiki: NPC face image ID (0 invalid value (default)). Specify the ID of the face image to be displayed in the Sign browsing menu, Kick menu, etc. If it is an invalid value, the dress-up model is displayed.

deactivateDist.Wiki: Distance at which the character is deactivated (valid only for open placement characters)

humanityLotId.Wiki: Specify the lottery ID of human nature to be acquired at the time of death

GameClearSpEffectID.Wiki: Special effect ID for lap bonus

physGuardCutRate.Wiki: Set the damage cut rate when guarding for each attack

magGuardCutRate.Wiki: If it is not a guard attack, enter 0

fireGuardCutRate.Wiki: How much to cut the fire attack?

thunGuardCutRate.Wiki: How much to cut the electric shock attack?

animIdOffset.Wiki: All animations will be played with IDs shifted by this number. If not, the original anime ID is referenced.

lockGazePoint0.AltName: Lock Gaze Point - Dummy Poly ID [0]
lockGazePoint0.Wiki: Gaze at the Damipoli specified when locking the Lock-on Damipoly 22X (-1 Invalid)

lockGazePoint1.AltName: Lock Gaze Point - Dummy Poly ID [1]
lockGazePoint1.Wiki: Gaze at the Damipoli specified when locking the Lock-on Damipoly 22X (-1 Invalid)

lockGazePoint2.AltName: Lock Gaze Point - Dummy Poly ID [2]
lockGazePoint2.Wiki: Gaze at the Damipoli specified when locking the Lock-on Damipoly 22X (-1 Invalid)

lockGazePoint3.AltName: Lock Gaze Point - Dummy Poly ID [3]
lockGazePoint3.Wiki: Gaze at the Damipoli specified when locking the Lock-on Damipoly 22X (-1 Invalid)

lockGazePoint4.AltName: Lock Gaze Point - Dummy Poly ID [4]
lockGazePoint4.Wiki: Gaze at the Damipoli specified when locking the Lock-on Damipoly 22X (-1 Invalid)

lockGazePoint5.AltName: Lock Gaze Point - Dummy Poly ID [5]
lockGazePoint5.Wiki: Gaze at the Damipoli specified when locking the Lock-on Damipoly 22X (-1 Invalid)

networkWarpDist.Wiki: Distance to warp instead of complementary movement in network synchronization. Faster people (ex dragons) need to be longer.

dbgBehaviorR1.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorL1.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorR2.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorL2.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorRL.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorRR.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorRD.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorRU.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorLL.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorLR.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorLD.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorLU.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

animIdOffset2.Wiki: All animations will be played with IDs shifted by this number. If not, the animation ID of the animation ID offset 1 is referred to.

partsDamageRate1.Wiki: Magnification that adapts to damage processing for part 1

partsDamageRate2.Wiki: Magnification that adapts to damage processing for part 2

partsDamageRate3.Wiki: Magnification that adapts to damage processing for part 3

partsDamageRate4.Wiki: Magnification that adapts to damage processing for part 4

partsDamageRate5.Wiki: Magnification that adapts to damage processing for part 5

partsDamageRate6.Wiki: Magnification to adapt to damage processing for part 6

partsDamageRate7.Wiki: Magnification that adapts to damage processing for part 7

partsDamageRate8.Wiki: Magnification that adapts to damage processing for part 8

weakPartsDamageRate.Wiki: Magnification that adapts to damage processing for weak points

superArmorRecoverCorrection.Wiki: Correction value for super armor recovery time

superArmorBrakeKnockbackDist.Wiki: Knockback distance that can be used only at the time of SA break

def_phys.Wiki: Damage reduction base value for physical attacks.

def_slash.Wiki: Look at the attack attribute, and if it is a slash attribute, reduce the defense power.

def_blow.Wiki: Look at the attack attribute, and if it is a hit attribute, reduce the defense power.

def_thrust.Wiki: Look at the attack attribute, and if it is a piercing attribute, reduce the defense power.

def_mag.Wiki: Damage reduction base value for magic attacks.

def_fire.Wiki: Damage reduction base value against fire attack.

def_thunder.Wiki: Damage reduction base value against electric shock attack.

defFlickPower.Wiki: Used to determine the repelling of enemy attacks. // It is intended to be repelled by normal attacks other than guards. // Enemies with a hard skin can be repelled without doing anything ... It doesn't matter if it is a normal enemy.

resist_curse.Wiki: Difficulty in dealing with abnormal curse conditions

ghostModelId.Wiki: Replacement model when wandering ghost, texture ID

normalChangeResouceId.Wiki: Replace resource ID during normal operation (do not use it unnecessarily)

guardAngle.Wiki: Defense range angle when guarding weapons. Pending

slashGuardCutRate.Wiki: Looking at the attack type, what percentage of the damage of the slashing attribute is cut? Specify

blowGuardCutRate.Wiki: Looking at the attack type, what percentage of the damage of the hit attribute is cut? Specify

thrustGuardCutRate.Wiki: Looking at the attack type, what percentage of the damage of the piercing attribute is cut? Specify

lockGazePoint6.Wiki: Gaze at the Damipoli specified when locking the Lock-on Damipoly 22X (-1 Invalid)

normalChangeTexChrId.Wiki: Normal replacement texture character ID (do not use it unnecessarily)

dropType.Wiki: Display method when dropping an item (corpse emission or item display)

knockbackRate.Wiki: Decrease value when receiving knockback damage / Specifically, cut the initial knockback speed of the attacking side

knockbackParamId.Wiki: Set the parameter ID used for knockback

staminaGuardDef.Wiki: Defense against enemy stamina attacks when guarding successfully

sleepGuardResist.Wiki: How much to cut the attack power against sleep (set as a special effect parameter)

madnessGuardResist.Wiki: How much to cut the attack power against madness (set as a special effect parameter)

lockGazePoint7.Wiki: Gaze at the Damipoli specified when locking the Lock-on Damipoly 22X (-1 Invalid)

flickDamageCutRate.Wiki: Set a value to attenuate damage when repelling an attack

npcType.Wiki: NPC type. OK if Zako enemies / boss enemies are distinguished

teamType.Wiki: NPC attack hit / not hit, aim / not aim setting

moveType.Wiki: Moving method. This changes the control.

materialSe_Weak1.Wiki: Determines the SE that sounds when the weak point is damaged. 1

materialSfx_Weak1.Wiki: Determines the SFX that occurs when the weak point is damaged. 1

partsDamageType.Wiki: Set the attack type to apply site damage

guardLevel.Wiki: When guarding, which guard motion will the enemy attack? Decide

burnSfxType.Wiki: SFX type at the time of combustion

poisonGuardResist.Wiki: How much to cut the attack power to poison (set to the special effect parameter)

diseaseGuardResist.Wiki: How much to cut the attack power (set as a special effect parameter) to make it a plague

bloodGuardResist.Wiki: How much to cut the attack power (set as a special effect parameter) to make bleeding

curseGuardResist.Wiki: How much to cut the attack power (set as a special effect parameter) to make a curse

parryAttack.Wiki: Parry attack power. Used by the parrying side

parryDefence.Wiki: Parry defense. Used by the parried side.

hitStopType.Wiki: Setting whether to perform hit stop processing

ladderEndChkOffsetTop.Wiki: Upper side of the ladder end judgment offset

ladderEndChkOffsetLow.Wiki: Lower side of ladder end judgment offset

useRagdollCamHit.Wiki: Does the camera hit the enemy ragdoll? (Valid only when hitting the player)

disableClothRigidHit.Wiki: If you want to prevent the cross rigid from hitting you

useUndulationAddAnimFB.Wiki: Whether to use front and back undulation addition

isWeakA.Wiki: Special attack A? Special attack A damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

isGhost.Wiki: The opponent's attack will be able to slip through. The attack hits only when the anti-spirit weapon of the weapon para is attacked with the weapon of . Be careful not to confuse it with a wandering ghost

isNoDamageMotion.Wiki: Do you not play the damage motion when the damage is 0?

isUnduration.Wiki: Do you match the back and forth rotation of the character with the undulations of the ground? Cannot be used for flying characters

isChangeWanderGhost.Wiki: Will it be a wandering ghost when the player is a client?

modelDispMask0.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask1.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask2.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask3.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask4.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask5.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask6.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask7.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask8.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask9.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask10.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask11.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask12.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask13.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask14.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask15.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

isEnableNeckTurn.Wiki: Do you want to enable the swing set in Param Weaver?

isMoveAnimWait.Wiki: Do you want to play the moving animation until the animation is over? (Like a mayfly dragon.)

isCrowd.Wiki: Do you want to reduce the processing load during crowds? For babies (preferably phalanx)

isWeakB.Wiki: Special attack B? Special attack B damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

isWeakC.Wiki: Special attack C? Special attack C damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

isWeakD.Wiki: Special attack D? Special attack D damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

doesAlwaysUseSpecialTurn.Wiki: Always execute a special turn (even if there is no navigation mesh at the turn destination, the special turn is continuously executed)

isRideAtkTarget.Wiki: Will you be the target of a riding special attack (if you are riding)?

isEnableStepDispInterpolate.Wiki: Whether to use step-over display interpolation

isStealthTarget.Wiki: Is it a stealth attack target?

disableInitializeDead.Wiki: If you do not make an initial death, TRUE, even if you kill and save it, the corpse will not be reproduced.

isHitRumble.Wiki: TRUE if it vibrates when hit. Use when you want to change from a normal hit stop, such as a dead person.

isSmoothTurn.Wiki: Whether to perform interpolation when turning between nodes in route movement

isWeakE.Wiki: Special attack E? Special attack E damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

isWeakF.Wiki: Special attack F? Special attack F damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

modelDispMask16.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask17.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask18.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask19.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask20.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask21.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask22.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask23.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask24.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask25.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask26.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask27.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask28.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask29.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask30.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask31.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

itemSearchRadius.Wiki: Radius to be added as a correction to the cylinder radius of normal Item search judgment (applicable to enemy drop items. Used for large characters etc.)

chrHitHeight.Wiki: The height of the capsule per character.

isSoulGetByBoss.Wiki: Do you get a boss in soul?

isBulletOwner_byObject.Wiki: If you become the owner of a bullet, a flag that applies the object's damage calculation related to the bullet. Used for damage correction by power.

isUseLowHitFootIk.AltName: Use FootIK Filter for Low Hit
isUseLowHitFootIk.Wiki: Whether to use the FootIk filter for low hits

isCalculatePvPDamage.Wiki: Decide whether to calculate damage as a player when calculating damage. If it is invalid, it is treated as an enemy.

isHostSyncChr.Wiki: Can only be activated when active in the host world

isSkipWeakDamageAnim.Wiki: Weakness damage Whether to skip animation playback. Part damage rate and defense material are treated as weak points just by not playing the animation.

isKeepHitOnRide.Wiki: When riding on a character with this parameter , the character's Atari remains while riding.

def_dark.Wiki: Damage reduction base value for dark attacks.

threatLv.Wiki: Threat level. If it is 0, even if the PC is found, FE that seems to be found is not displayed.

specialTurnDistanceThreshold.Wiki: Make a special turn when the distance to the target is greater than or equal to the set threshold

autoFootEffectSfxId.Wiki: The SFX identifier used in the automatic foot effect. (ZZZ of XYYZZZ)

materialSe1.Wiki: Determine the SE that sounds when damaged. 1. It is OK to set it by appearance.

materialSfx1.Wiki: Determine the SFX that occurs when you take damage. 1. It is OK to set it by appearance.

materialSe_Weak2.Wiki: Determines the SE that sounds when the weak point is damaged. 2

materialSfx_Weak2.Wiki: Determines the SFX that occurs when the weak point is damaged. 2

materialSe2.Wiki: Determine the SE that sounds when damaged. 2. It is OK to set it by appearance.

materialSfx2.Wiki: Determine the SFX that occurs when you take damage. 2. It is OK to set it by appearance.

autoFootEffectDecalBaseId1.AltName: Automatic Foot Effect - Decal Base ID [1]
autoFootEffectDecalBaseId1.Wiki: Decal to be attached when a foot effect occurs. Floor material is also taken into consideration

toughnessRecoverCorrection.Wiki: Correction value for toughness recovery time

neutralDamageCutRate.Wiki: Non-attribute damage multiplier. The final damage value is the value obtained by multiplying the damage calculation result by this value.

slashDamageCutRate.Wiki: Slash damage multiplier. The final damage value is the value obtained by multiplying the damage calculation result by this value.

blowDamageCutRate.Wiki: Batter damage multiplier. The final damage value is the value obtained by multiplying the damage calculation result by this value.

thrustDamageCutRate.Wiki: Puncture damage ratio. The final damage value is the value obtained by multiplying the damage calculation result by this value.

magicDamageCutRate.Wiki: Magic damage multiplier. The final damage value is the value obtained by multiplying the damage calculation result by this value.

fireDamageCutRate.Wiki: Flame damage multiplier. The final damage value is the value obtained by multiplying the damage calculation result by this value.

thunderDamageCutRate.Wiki: Electric shock damage ratio. The final damage value is the value obtained by multiplying the damage calculation result by this value.

darkDamageCutRate.Wiki: Dark damage multiplier. The final damage value is the value obtained by multiplying the damage calculation result by this value.

darkGuardCutRate.Wiki: How much to cut the dark attack?

npcPlayerWeightType.Wiki: Equipment weight type applied for NPC players

normalChangeAnimChrId.Wiki: Replace the target animation with the specified ID Anibnd

resistCorrectId_disease.Wiki: When the abnormal condition is activated, the maximum value is temporarily changed by using the set value of the abnormal condition resistance correction parameter.

phantomShaderId.Wiki: ID of the phantom parameter .xlsm to apply

maxAnklePitchAngle.Wiki: FootIK Ankle pitch limit angle (-1 no limit). If you have not set Foot End L S in HAT, this angle is used in common with rolls.

resist_freeze.Wiki: Difficulty in getting cold air condition abnormal

freezeGuardResist.Wiki: How much to cut the attack power against cold air (set as a special effect parameter)

lockCameraParamId.Wiki: The ID of the lock camera parameter applied to the camera when locked on. Highest priority. Unused if -1

disableLockOnAng.Wiki: Create a conical lock-on non-lockable area beneath the enemy. The angle of the size of the cone. Can be changed temporarily from TAE

clothOffLodLevel.AltName: LOD Level to Disable Cloth Processing
clothOffLodLevel.Wiki: Set the LOD level to turn off cross processing

isUseFootIKNormalByUnduration.AltName: Use Foot IK for Undulating Character
isUseFootIKNormalByUnduration.Wiki: Do you use the FootIK result to match your character to the undulations of the ground? Cannot be used for flying characters

attachHitInitializeDead.Wiki: Whether to ground the capsule at the time of initial death

excludeGroupRewardCheck.Wiki: Group reward In the judgment of all dead, characters with this parameter are excluded from the judgment.

estusFlaskRecoveryParamId.Wiki: When the character dies, the data ID of the est usage count recovery parameter .xlsm, which is the same as the value, is acquired and the est bottle is recovered. Unused if -1

roleNameId.Wiki: Specify the role name at the time of summoning. -1 Use the default role name of the target spirit body. 0 No display. 1 or more Used as a text ID.

estusFlaskLotPoint.Wiki: HP / MP est recovery probability when defeating an enemy. The numerator is obtained from the NPC para with 10000 as the denominator.

hpEstusFlaskLotPoint.Wiki: Recovery probability of MP Est when defeating an enemy. The numerator is obtained from the NPC para with 10000 as the denominator.

mpEstusFlaskLotPoint.Wiki: Recovery probability of MP Est when defeating an enemy. The numerator is obtained from the NPC para with 10000 as the denominator.

estusFlaskRecovery_failedLotPointAdd.AltName: Missed HP/FP Flask Recovery - Bonus Chance
estusFlaskRecovery_failedLotPointAdd.Wiki: Next time probability increase value when you miss the HP / MP est recovery lottery. Addition value of numerator.

hpEstusFlaskRecovery_failedLotPointAdd.AltName: Missed HP Flask Recovery - Bonus Chance
hpEstusFlaskRecovery_failedLotPointAdd.Wiki: The next probability increase value when you miss the HP Est Recovery Lottery. Addition value of numerator.

mpEstusFlaskRecovery_failedLotPointAdd.AltName: Missed FP Flask Recovery - Bonus Chance
mpEstusFlaskRecovery_failedLotPointAdd.Wiki: The next probability increase value when the MP est recovery lottery is missed. Addition value of numerator.

WanderGhostPhantomId.Wiki: Phantom shader with ID specified only on the guest side Specify the phantom shader ID and make it an illusion

hearingHeadSize.Wiki: The offset size to be set instead of the capsule offset at the time of hearing judgment. Use this value as an offset only if it is set to 0 or higher.

SoundBankId.Wiki: Sound bank ID can be specified -1 Use the bank of character ID (resource name)

forwardUndulationLimit.Wiki: The upper limit angle when adjusting the front-back angle to the undulation. If the total length is long, it is better to set it lower.

sideUndulationLimit.Wiki: Upper limit angle when adjusting the left and right angles to the undulations. If the total length is long, it is better to set it lower.

deactiveMoveDist.Wiki: Distance to switch to platoon deactive movement [m]

enableSoundObjDist.Wiki: The distance from the player for which the character sound source is valid. -1 Effective at all distances

undulationCorrectGain.Wiki: Set the speed when adjusting the angle to the undulations

autoFootEffectDecalBaseId2.AltName: Automatic Foot Effect - Decal Base ID [2]
autoFootEffectDecalBaseId2.Wiki: Decal to be attached when a foot effect occurs. Floor material is also taken into consideration

autoFootEffectDecalBaseId3.AltName: Automatic Foot Effect - Decal Base ID [3]
autoFootEffectDecalBaseId3.Wiki: Decal to be attached when a foot effect occurs. Floor material is also taken into consideration

RetargetReferenceChrId.Wiki: Character ID to be referred to when specifying the motion retarget destination

SfxResBankId.Wiki: SFX resource bank ID can be specified -1 Use the bank of character ID (resource name)

updateActivatePriolity.Wiki: Used to determine the activation / renewal level. The larger it is, the lower the update level will be even if you are far from the player.

chrNavimeshFlag_Alive.Wiki: Flag the value of the touching Nav Mesh while the character is alive. Does not follow the movement.

chrNavimeshFlag_Dead.Wiki: Flag the value on the touching Nav Mesh while the character is dying. Does not follow the movement.

wheelRotRadius.Wiki: Specify the radius of the wheel [m]

retargetMoveRate.Wiki: Magnification of movement amount at the time of retargeting

ladderWarpOffset.Wiki: Offsets along the Damipoly Z-axis at the specified value. Both positive and negative numbers can be specified.

loadAssetId.Wiki: Asset ID to be read in connection with character loading (for dynamic generation of characters, etc.).

overlapCameraDmypolyId.Wiki: Set the Damipoly ID (220-227) to enable the overlap camera. If it is -1, it will be invalid.

sleepCollectorItemLotId_enemy.Wiki: Specify the lottery ID_for enemies of the item to be acquired when collecting Nemuri. Please set only one of them.

sleepCollectorItemLotId_map.Wiki: Specify for the lottery ID_map of the item to be acquired when collecting Nemuri. Please set only one of them.

footIkErrorOnGain.Wiki: FootIK Appearance height correction ON gain value

footIkErrorOffGain.Wiki: FootIK Appearance height correction OFF gain value

SoundAddBankId.Wiki: You can specify an additional sound bank ID -1 or 0 No addition (SEQ 16135)

materialVariationValue.Wiki: It is a value used in combination with the defense material to classify abnormal conditions, damage SFX, and SE. SEQ16473

materialVariationValue_Weak.Wiki: It is a value used for variation of abnormal condition, damage SFX, SE in combination with weak point defense material. SEQ16473

saRecoveryRate.Wiki: Correct the SA recovery speed by multiplying the SA basic recovery amount

saGuardCutRate.Wiki: Cut rate of SA damage when guard is successful

resistCorrectId_blood.Wiki: When the abnormal condition is activated, the maximum value is temporarily changed by using the setting value of the abnormal condition resistance correction parameter.

resistCorrectId_curse.Wiki: When the abnormal condition is activated, the maximum value is temporarily changed by using the set value of the abnormal condition resistance correction parameter.

resistCorrectId_freeze.Wiki: When the abnormal condition is activated, the maximum value is temporarily changed by using the setting value of the abnormal condition resistance correction parameter.

resistCorrectId_sleep.Wiki: When the abnormal condition is activated, the maximum value is temporarily changed by using the set value of the abnormal condition resistance correction parameter.

resistCorrectId_madness.Wiki: When the abnormal condition is activated, the maximum value is temporarily changed by using the set value of the abnormal condition resistance correction parameter.

chrDeadTutorialFlagId.Wiki: Event flag ID for the tutorial when the character is defeated for the first time. Flag ON when the character dies.

stepDispInterpolateTriggerValue.Wiki: Step crossing display activation judgment value

Self.Wiki: Defines the stats for a given enemy or group of enemies. Does not determine model or location.\nStats are often affected greatly by attached SpEffects.
